tasks.name: NGINX
tasks.command: (if [[ $(pgrep nginx | head -1) ]]; then echo 1; else echo 0; fi) | tail -1

tasks.name: NODE
tasks.command: (if [[ $(pgrep node | head -1) ]]; then echo 1; else echo 0; fi) | tail -1

tasks.name: REDIS
tasks.command: (if [[ $(rdcli -u ${REDIS_CONNECTIONSTRING} info | grep ^role | tr -d '\r' | head -1) = 'role:master' ]]; then echo 1; else echo 0; fi) | tail -1

tasks.name: POSTGRES
tasks.command: (if [[ $(pg_isready -d ${POSTGRES_CONNECTIONSTRING}) == *'accepting connections'* ]]; then echo 1; else echo 0; fi) | tail -1

tasks.name: AMQP
tasks.command: (if [[ $(rabbitmqctl node_health_check -n rabbit) == *'Health check passed'* ]]; then echo 1; else echo 0; fi) | tail -1

hardware.name: RAM
hardware.command: free | grep Mem | awk '{ print ($3-$7)/$2*100}'  | cut -d . -f 1
